name: UV Filter
description: UV lens filters prevent dust and dirt from coming into contact with the lens essentially acting as a protective cover that shields your lens at all times.

name: Cleaning Kit
description: For cleaning, use a soft, dry cloth, such as a microfiber cloth, to clean the camera body gently of any grime, dust, or fingerprints.

name: Tripod Stand
description: A tripod is a portable three-legged frame or stand, used as a platform for supporting the weight and maintaining the stability of some other object.

name: Protected Lens
description: A lens is a tool used to bring light to a fixed focal point. In a film camera, the lens directs light to a digital sensor.

name: Camera Case
description: It is also known as messenger bags, shoulder bags are among the most popular of camera bags.

name: Duel Battery
description: Most cameras accept standard AA batteries, but you have options in what kind of AA batteries you use.
